intro.p_title: SK Chemicals always looks <br class='pc_only'/> for ways to make better pharmaceutical products

1.title: Overview
1.description: R&D is the source of competitiveness for pharmaceutical companies. As such, SK Chemicals has committed its research capabilities in developing pharmaceutical products with global competitiveness. SK Chemicals Research Center holds outstanding competencies and expertise across all stages of pharmaceutical R&D including drug formulations research, analytical research, process development and manufacturing of various dosage forms.

2.title: Quality by Design
2.description: R&D is the source of competitiveness for pharmaceutical companies. As such, SK Chemicals has committed its research capabilities in developing pharmaceutical products with global competitiveness. SK Chemicals Central Research Center holds outstanding competencies and expertise across all stages of pharmaceutical R&D including drug formulations research, analytical research, process development and manufacturing of various dosage forms.

investments.p_title: SK Chemicals is looking for <br class='pc_only'/> Bio-Ventures to share growth and future values

1.title: Overview
description: Since 2020, SK Chemicals has been establishing a strategic cooperative relationship through investment by discovering promising domestic and foreign ventures as part of open innovation. Currently, we have completed the establishment of venture investment networks at home and abroad, and are looking for companies that can put their effort to share common growth and future values.
Through connections with more venture companies with global-level R&D capabilities, we want to continue expanding oour growth by sharing business strategies and future visions.

SK Chemicals is focusing on our key R&D areas while also opening up opportunities for possible future expansion areas, and intends to invest with open possibilities in the prelude to attracting investment from companies.

2.title: Aim
2.description: For companies focusing on the key R&D areas selected by SK Chemicals, we are seeking to cooperate from the early stages of establishment (Seed), and for future business expansion we are exploring investment opportunities from the time when the nature of the business area is confirmed (Series B).

3.title: Key Areas
3.description: The company's key R&D areas include neurological diseases, musculoskeletal diseases, urological diseases, kidney diseases, and metabolic diseases, inflammatory diseases, and central nervous system diseases which are the fields that has been recognized by the market and has a commercial sales network.

4.title: Future<br class='pc_only' />Expansion Areas
4.description: The company's future business expansion areas include diabetes complications, Alzheimer's dementia, autoimmune diseases, cancer diseases, and genome editing/genetic treatments, targeted proteolysis, and cell therapy, which are favorable to strengthening and expanding our sales network in the market.

contactUs.p_title: SK Chemicals always looks <br class='pc_only'/> for ways to make better pharmaceutical products

li_title.2: The purpose of collection and use of personal information
li_title.3: Period of possession and use of personal information

li_txt.1:
We collect your personal information for user sign up, customer consultations, and service requests.
  • Personal information : email address, and contact information
  • Means of collection : our website (Ask a Question)
li_txt.2:
We use our customers' personal information for the purposes stated below.
  • Management
  • To handle customer complaints and feedback
li_txt.3: Your personal information will be destroyed without exception or delay after our customer support team achieves the purpose for which the information was collected and used.
